entry.title: Move to Johns Hopkins
entry.content: I’m happy to announce that I’m joining Meghan Avolio’s Lab at Johns Hopkins University in Baltimore, where I’ll be comparing evolution of plants inside and outside of city centers. And eating more crab cakes!
entry.summary: I’m happy to announce that I’m joining Meghan Avolio’s Lab at Johns Hopkins University in Baltimore, where I’ll be comparing evolution of plants inside and outside of city centers. And eating more crab cakes!

entry.title: Blue Grama Diversity - published!
entry.content: My work on blue grama grass diversity has been published! See the article in New Phytologist.
entry.summary: My work on blue grama grass diversity has been published! See the article in New Phytologist.
